title: The CNN Miami Republican debate transcript, annotated
text: By Team Fix Donald Trump, Sen. Ted Cruz, Sen. Marco Rubio and Gov. John Kasich debated Thursday night in Miami, five days before the winner-take-all GOP primary in Florida. The complete transcript is posted below. Washington Post reporters and readers using Genius have annotated it, and will continue to do so following the debate. Most read 1 Dan Diamond and Paige Winfield Cunningham GOP plans to replace Obamacare have failed. Here’s what lawmakers propose now. 2 Column Ben Noll and Daniel Wolfe How snowy could it be where you live this winter? Look up your area. 3 Terrence McCoy One man’s obsessive quest to uncover Brazil’s buried Nazi past 4 Lisa Bonos How a tech billionaire philanthropist got caught between Trump and San Francisco 5 Natalie Compton 15 definitive rules for the airport bar Sign up
